TEXT.TITLE: CAMPBELL RED LAKE MINES LTD <CRK> 4TH QTR NET
TEXT.BODY:
Shr 21 cts vs 10 cts Net 10,798,000 vs 4,704,000 Revs 47.4 mln vs 32.9 mln YEAR Shr 58 cts vs 54 cts Net 29.1 mln vs 25.8 mln Revs 187.7 mln vs 134.7 mln Note: 1986 net includes 2.8 mln dlr extraordinary gain in 4th qtr and 6.5 mln dlr fl-yr extraordinary loss involving provision for decline in market value of marketable securities partly offset by gain from sale of stake in Dome Petroleum Ltd <DMP>.
